description: skull cap type hat with rag tassels; red, white and black fabric in strips, stitched with white thread; two white panels have red and green triangular shaped patches attached; tassels at top in red, blue, green, white and two printed fabrics--one red and white, the other green, white and red; two pieces of black fabric hang from bottom edge of cap
markings: on inside lining, on cloth tag: [A6]
title: Hat
